name: PORTO_correlation_dragCoefficient
description: Correlation for the drag coefficient to be used in Euler-Euler Simulations

dimensions.name: nParams
dimensions.description: Number of the parameters required to specify the correlation

dimensions.name: nInfluence
dimensions.description: Number of variables that influence the correlation

properties.name: code origin
properties.description: Code name, version that was used to produce data for the correlation

properties.name: nameInfluenceVariables
properties.description: Name of variables that influence the correlation

properties.name: eqnType
properties.description: Name of the function used to interpret parameters and compute the result of the correlation
